metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3659 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s IEEE802.15.4 wireless networking subsystem in the way the user closes theLR-WPAN connection. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
